BrowseEventsActivity
The BrowseEventsActivity class is responsible for displaying a list of events that users (either admins or participants) can browse in the app.
BrowseEventsActivityTest
 
CircleTransform
A transformation for Picasso to render images in a circular shape.
EntrantEditUserDetailsView
The EntrantEditUserDetailsView activity allows entrants to edit their profile details, including name, email, phone number, and notification preferences.
EntrantEditUserDetailsViewTest
 
EntrantEventDetailsActivity
The EntrantEventDetailsActivity displays detailed information about a specific event and allows the user to join a waitlist for the event.
EntrantEventDetailsActivityTest
 
EntrantHomeView
This class handles all the features and interactions for the Entrant's home screen.
EntrantHomeViewTest
EntrantHomeViewTest will test if the EntrantHomeView will open up all its navagatability by clicking all the buttons
EntrantNotificationsActivity
Activity that handles displaying notifications for the entrant user.
EntrantNotificationsActivityTest
 
Event
The Event Class represents an Event stored in the system It stores the Organizer User Object that created the event This class provides implements methods to update and create Event Model Objects.
EventArrayAdapter
Adapter to populate a ListView or GridView with event data, including dynamic poster loading.
EventConfigurator
 
EventController
Controller for managing Event operations.
EventDetailsAdminActivity
Activity that displays the details of an event for the admin user.
EventDetailsAdminActivityTest
 
EventRecyclerArrayAdapter
RecyclerView.Adapter for displaying a list of Events with poster functionality.
EventRecyclerArrayAdapter.EventViewHolder
ViewHolder for event items.
EventRecyclerArrayAdapter.OnEventLongClickListener
Interface to handle long-click events on events.
EventRepository
The EventRepository class provides methods for interacting with event-related data in Firestore and Firebase Storage.
EventRepository.DeleteCallback
Interface for receiving the result of deletion operations.
EventRepository.EventCallback
Interface for receiving the result of event-related operations (add, update, delete).
EventRepository.FirebasePosterCallback
Interface for receiving the result of uploading a poster image.
EventTest
 
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
FacilityProfileActivity
Activity class for managing the facility profile.
FacilityProfileTest
 
FacilityRepository
 
FacilityRepository.FacilityCallback
Callback interface for facility-related Firestore operations.
FacilityUserImpl
This class represents a user associated with a facility.
FacilityUserImplTest
 
FullScreenImageActivity
Activity that displays a poster image in full-screen mode and allows the user to delete it.
LotteryTest
 
MainActivity
MainActivity is the landing page for users when they open the app this acitivity sends the User to a sign up page if not logged in otherwise it sends the user to their respective home page
MapViewActivity
 
NoNotificationPermissionRequester
 
Notification
Notification Class Represents a notification associated with an event, waitlist, and user.
NotificationAdapter
Adapter class for displaying notifications in a ListView.
NotificationController
Notification Controller provides all the methods to update the Notification Model
NotificationControllerTest
Tests controller methods for Notification objects
NotificationPermissionRequester
 
NotificationRepository
This class provides the necessary methods to write, delete, update, and fetch notifications from the notifications table in Firebase
NotificationRepository.NotificationCallback<T>
Callback interface to handle results or failures of notification operations.
NotificationUtils
This class provides common global variables for Notification related classes
OrganizerCancelledView
Activity that displays the list of users who have cancelled from a waitlist for an event.
OrganizerChosenView
Activity that displays the list of users who have been chosen by lottery from a waitlist for an event.
OrganizerCreateEvent
This activity allows an organizer to create an event by entering event details such as name, location, description, and date.
OrganizerEventDetailsActivity
Activity that displays details of an event organized by the user.
OrganizerEventTest
 
OrganizerGenerateQrCodeTest
 
OrganizerHomeView
This activity represents the home screen for the event organizer.
OrganizerNotificationTest
 
OrganizerWaitlistTest
 
OrganizerWaitlistView
This class represents the activity where an organizer can view the waitlist for an event.
PosterAdapter
Adapter for displaying a list of posters in a RecyclerView.
PosterAdapter.PosterViewHolder
ViewHolder class for holding a reference to the poster image view.
QrCodeScannerActivity
Activity that allows the user to scan a QR code and navigate to the details of an event.
RanBackground
Controller for managing Background Randomly assigns one view to the background of the app.
SelectUserTypeActivity
This activity allows the user to select their user type (Organizer or Participant) during the sign-up process.
SignUpActivity
This activity handles the user sign-up process.
SignUpActivityUITest
 
TestDataHelper
 
User
Interface representing a User in the system.
UserArrayAdapter
Array adapter for User Objects, used to inflate and display a list of Users in different views like Cancelled waitlist, regular waitlist, chosen waitlist etc...
UserController
Controller for managing User operations.
UserImpl
Implementation of the User interface.
UserRepository
Provides necessary methods to update, delete, and write User model objects into Firebase User table.
UserRepository.FirestoreCallbackAllUsers
Callback interface to handle Firestore query results for users collection.
UserRepository.FirestoreCallbackSingleUser
Callback interface for querying for a single user.
UserRepository.UserTypeCallback
Callback interface to handle the result of the existence check and userType retrieval.
UserTest
 
UserUtils
utilization of the User interface.
ValidationErrorDialog
 
WaitList
The WaitList class represents a waiting list for an event.
WaitlistActivity
This activity displays the user's waitlist for events.
WaitlistActivityTest
 
WaitListConfigurator
The WaitListConfigurator interface defines the behavior of a WaitList.
WaitListController
Provides methods to edit a WaitList Model and make changes in firebase.
WaitListControllerTest
 
WaitListDb
The WaitListDb interface provides necessary methods to update user table in firebase.
WaitlistedUsersRecyclerAdapter
RecyclerView adapter for displaying a list of users who are waitlisted for an event.
WaitlistedUsersRecyclerAdapter.WaitlistedUsersViewHolder
ViewHolder class for holding references to the views for each list item.
WaitListRepository
The WaitListRepository class provides methods to create, update, delete, and query waitlist documents in Firestore.
WaitListRepository.FirestoreCallback
 
WaitListRepository.WaitListCallback
 
WaitListTest
